title: Financial Management for James Bond Cosplay Charity Contest
description: We’re hosting the ROBLOX World Builders Championship – West Africa Regional Finals in Lagos, and we need a freelancer to design a high-impact marketing and event page. The page should capture the energy of competitive gaming while making it simple for fans, teams, and sponsors to get information, register, and engage.

milestones.title: Phase 1 – Research & Financial Setup
milestones.description: Analyze the contest structure, NFT wallet systems, and any legal or tax implications. Set up a secure bookkeeping framework for tracking incoming funds, NFT transfers, and contest-related expenses. Deliver a ledger template and reporting workflow for clear oversight.
